sentences.sContent: ...the conventional notion of women as uncritical purchasers of heavily advertised products.
sentences.sCn: ...妇女是对广告轰炸宣传的商品不批判的购买者这一传统观点。

words.tran: 不加鉴别地；不加批评地

trans.tranCn: 无批判力的,不加批判的
trans.tranOther: unable or unwilling to see faults in something or someone – used to show disapproval
